items.title: Walmart is selling a $90 heated neck and shoulder massager for $38
items.description: The hands-free device can be used to target pain in other areas of the body as well.

items.title: Beloved sporting goods retailer closing after 41 years
items.description: After 41 years, this key regional retailer can't afford to keep its doors open.
